names.pinyin: lei shi qing liang di shu fa
names.commonEnglish: Master Lei's Summerheat-Clearing, Cooling and Flushing Method

actions: Releases Summeheat, resolves Dampness, promotes urination and drains Heat from the Urinary Bladder.
With Gan Cao, for Summerheat causing painful urinary dysfunction, thirst, irritability and fever.
Clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity, moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.
With Bai Bian Dou, for a fever, dizziness and a stifling sensation in the chest associated with Summerheat.
Clears Summerheat, resolves Dampness and Strengthens the Spleen.
Clears Heat, especially in the Upper Jiao, relieves toxicity and promotes urination.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness and strengthens the Spleen.
